nodes.title: Speak to Octavien at (I-8) (Sverdhried Hillock Waypoint) of Eastern Adoulin while your main job is l
nodes.description: Speak to Octavien at (I-8) (Sverdhried Hillock Waypoint) of Eastern Adoulin while your main job is level 30 or higher.

nodes.title: Obtain the the Yahse Wildflower Petal at (K-7) of Yahse Hunting Grounds by examining the Yahse Wildf
nodes.description: Obtain the the Yahse Wildflower Petal at (K-7) of Yahse Hunting Grounds by examining the Yahse Wildflower. To reach the flowers it is easiest to leave from Eastern Adoulin via the boat at (G-5), the nearest Waypoint is "The Wharf to Yahse". Nearly all monsters on route are non-aggressive (so long as you stay away from the beach near the wildflowers). However Umbril, which appear at night between 20:00-4:00, are aggressive to sight and magic.

nodes.title: Return to Octavien, Use the Sverdhried Hillock Waypoint just north of him.
nodes.description: Return to Octavien, Use the Sverdhried Hillock Waypoint just north of him. During the cutscene, you must select "Use Rune Enchantment...?" anywhere from 1 to 100 times. The number of times is random.

nodes.title: After the cutscene, you receive a Sowilo Claymore and unlock the Rune Fencer job.
nodes.description: After the cutscene, you receive a Sowilo Claymore and unlock the Rune Fencer job. Note: the Sowilo Claymore is used in a Rune Fencer Artifact quest, so hold on to it if you want to save gil. If you discard it, an Elixir must be used for that quest instead.

nodes.title: Speak to Sylvie at (I-5) in Western Adoulin (Waypoint Adoulin Waterfront) with your main job at leve
nodes.description: Speak to Sylvie at (I-5) in Western Adoulin (Waypoint Adoulin Waterfront) with your main job at level 30 or higher to begin the quest.

nodes.title: Obtain a Petrified Log and a Fistful of homeland soil.
nodes.description: Obtain a Petrified Log and a Fistful of homeland soil. Your Fistful of homeland soil can be obtained by checking the "Ergon Locus ???" under the stairs of the telepoint from the crag associated with your home nation (i.e. San d'Oria = Holla, Windurst = Mea, and Bastok = Dem).

nodes.title: Trade the Petrified Log to Sylvie with the Fistful of homeland soil in your Temporary key Items list
nodes.description: Trade the Petrified Log to Sylvie with the Fistful of homeland soil in your Temporary key Items list to obtain your Luopan.

nodes.title: Go to Ceizak Battlegrounds (K-10) where there is a small island just off the coast to find the Ergon
nodes.description: Go to Ceizak Battlegrounds (K-10) where there is a small island just off the coast to find the Ergon Locus.

nodes.title: Use the /heal command next to the Ergon Locus.
nodes.description: Use the /heal command next to the Ergon Locus. Rest until you see the following message: "You feel a mystical warmth welling up inside you!" Note: It can take up to 8 minutes for the message to appear.

nodes.title: Return to Sylvie to obtain the Geomancer job, an Indi-Poison plate, and a Matre Bell.
nodes.description: Return to Sylvie to obtain the Geomancer job, an Indi-Poison plate, and a Matre Bell. Warning: The Matre Bell is one of the few Handbells in the game, so do not discard it. You can re buy the Handbell for 300000 gil or 150000 bayld, by speaking to Sylvie as a Geomancer as your main job.

nodes.title: Talk to Octavien as a Rune Fencer to receive a Runic kinegraver.
nodes.description: Talk to Octavien as a Rune Fencer to receive a Runic kinegraver.

nodes.title: Speak to Gaddiux at the Inventors' Coalition and ask about Adoulinian kelp.
nodes.description: Speak to Gaddiux at the Inventors' Coalition and ask about Adoulinian kelp.

nodes.title: Next, ask if the rune stone is still there.
nodes.description: Next, ask if the rune stone is still there. There is a bug with the quest dialog where it will sometimes go to a third set of questions: 1) something about a trial 2) ask if rune stone is still there? and 3) Will I die today? Choose option 1 about the trial. This will give you final dialog scene, so that you can progress to Part 2.

nodes.title: Head to Yahse Hunting Grounds (K-7) to obtain another Yahse wildflower petal.
nodes.description: Head to Yahse Hunting Grounds (K-7) to obtain another Yahse wildflower petal.

nodes.title: Talk to Udip Ferawoh at the Marjami Ravine Frontier Station.
nodes.description: Talk to Udip Ferawoh at the Marjami Ravine Frontier Station.

nodes.title: Stand next to a Spinescent Protuberance and receive amnesia 5 times.
nodes.description: Stand next to a Spinescent Protuberance and receive amnesia 5 times. It is not necessary to engage the Spinescent Protuberances. You can keep sneak and invisible up while you collect the amnesia. Protuberances are incapable of dispelling these status effects. Only the Marjami Ravine Spinescent Protuberances work; the ones in Dho Gates do not count for this quest. One can be found just south of Bivouac #1, at (K-12). Some can be also be found around (H-10), through the tunnel with the Riverscum.

nodes.title: A message displays when you have been afflicted 5 times.
nodes.description: A message displays when you have been afflicted 5 times. It may take several minutes for the Spinescent Protuberance to inflict amnesia all five times. Un-equipping magic evasion or primary armor item level gear will greatly increase the chance you are affected by amnesia. Reducing the Spinescent Protuberance's hit points to or below 25% causes it to cast amnesia very frequently. It will not reset while you are in the immediate vicinity, even if you disengage, and will continue to cast with this increased frequency even if you return to using sneak and invisible. Using this method a single Spectral Jig from Dancer subjob was more than ample time to collect all five statuses.

nodes.title: Return to Udip Ferawoh for a cutscene with Orsa-Porsa and Toppled Tree, as well as a 500 bayld rewar
nodes.description: Return to Udip Ferawoh for a cutscene with Orsa-Porsa and Toppled Tree, as well as a 500 bayld reward and the Restrainment resilience survival skill.

nodes.title: Talk to Mano-Amano at the Frontier Station in Yorcia Weald to begin the quest.
nodes.description: Talk to Mano-Amano at the Frontier Station in Yorcia Weald to begin the quest.

nodes.title: Go to Yorcia Weald (I-8) (take Bivouac #3 if possible) and click on the ??? located among the Numbin
nodes.description: Go to Yorcia Weald (I-8) (take Bivouac #3 if possible) and click on the ??? located among the Numbing Blossoms to obtain a Fistful of numbing soil. An obstructing bush blocks (I-8) nearly all the time. It despawns briefly from 21:00 to 3:00 game time. Quickly examine the ??? to obtain the key item, then leave the area blocked by the bush or warp out. It is impossible to death-warp out because Numbing Blossoms cannot kill you and there are no other enemies in this small area. If you don't leave before 3:00 and you have no method of warping, you are stuck here until 21:00.

nodes.title: Return to Mano-Amano for your reward.
nodes.description: Return to Mano-Amano for your reward.

missions.title: Do Not Go Into the Light

nodes.title: Examine "Door: Svenja's Manor" at (I-8) for a cutscene with Alianne and Ari-Barali.
nodes.description: Examine "Door: Svenja's Manor" at (I-8) for a cutscene with Alianne and Ari-Barali.

nodes.title: Examine "Door: Hospital" at (I-9) for a cutscene with Logan.
nodes.description: Examine "Door: Hospital" at (I-9) for a cutscene with Logan.

nodes.title: Warp to the Morimar Basalt Fields frontier station and talk to Borghest for a cutscene with Donda-Bo
nodes.description: Warp to the Morimar Basalt Fields frontier station and talk to Borghest for a cutscene with Donda-Bonda and Jaureche.

nodes.title: Obtain a Fire Crystal, a length of Urunday Lumber, and a Damascus Ingot, then trade them to Chanteil
nodes.description: Obtain a Fire Crystal, a length of Urunday Lumber, and a Damascus Ingot, then trade them to Chanteillie in Western Adoulin (J-10) to obtain a Inventor's Coalition pickaxe.

nodes.title: Return to "Door: Hospital" for a cutscene with Alianne and Othellius and 1000 bayld in exchange for
nodes.description: Return to "Door: Hospital" for a cutscene with Alianne and Othellius and 1000 bayld in exchange for the Inventor's Coalition pickaxe.

missions.title: Don't Clam Up on Me Now

nodes.title: Speak to Oblor at Frontier Station in Yahse Hunting Grounds (K-9).
nodes.description: Speak to Oblor at Frontier Station in Yahse Hunting Grounds (K-9)

nodes.title: Head to the seashore in Yahse Hunting Grounds and click 5 "Shellfish" targets.
nodes.description: Head to the seashore in Yahse Hunting Grounds and click 5 "Shellfish" targets. If you collect shellfish near the Orobons, a true-hearing Alluring Orobon NM can randomly appear when you click the shellfish. If you collect shellfish near the Bight Uragnites, a true-hearing Startled Uragnite NM can randomly appear when you click the shellfish. If you zone before talking to Oblor, the count resets to zero. Reraise is necessary if you don't plan to kill the randomly spawned NM. Alternatively, the Startled Uragnite is susceptible to Sleep (the Alluring Orobon may be as well) which can provide ample time to collect the necessary Shellfish and return to Oblor to finish the quest. With enhanced movement speed, you may outrun the Orobon without taking any damage and it will quickly lose interest.

nodes.title: Return to Oblor once you have collected all 5.
nodes.description: Return to Oblor once you have collected all 5.

nodes.title: Speak with Audibert in the back of the Scouts' Coalition in Eastern Adoulin F-9.
nodes.description: Speak with Audibert in the back of the Scouts' Coalition in Eastern Adoulin F-9.

nodes.title: Next, speak to the following NPCs (if you do not speak to the NPCs, you will receive a message which
nodes.description: Next, speak to the following NPCs (if you do not speak to the NPCs, you will receive a message which states "There is nothing out of the ordinary here" when you check the spots. TALK to the NPCs first).

nodes.title: Speak to Sylvie at (I-5) in Western Adoulin (Waypoint Adoulin Waterfront) as a Geomancer level 66 or
nodes.description: Speak to Sylvie at (I-5) in Western Adoulin (Waypoint Adoulin Waterfront) as a Geomancer level 66 or higher to begin the quest. NOTE: Should you not have your original handbell on you, she may ask you to purchase a new one for 300,000 gil or 150,000 baylds. Quit the dialog and try again for the quest.

nodes.title: Go to Morimar Basalt Fields at Frontier Bivouac #1 and talk to Dabnorrin for cutscene with Hostenn a
nodes.description: Go to Morimar Basalt Fields at Frontier Bivouac #1 and talk to Dabnorrin for cutscene with Hostenn and a Vessel of summoning

nodes.title: Go to the Primordial Convergence near the Ergon Locus at Snowdrift Arbor (K-6).
nodes.description: Go to the Primordial Convergence near the Ergon Locus at Snowdrift Arbor (K-6). Examine the Primordial Convergence as a Geomancer to spawn Burgeoning Flames. You have 10 minutes after popping to defeat the NM. If you die or run out of time, you can obtain another Vessel of summoning from Dabnorrin Dabnorrin offers one Vessel of summoning free per day. Any additional attempts must be purchased for either 50,000 Gil, 5,000 Bayld, or 10 Beastmen's Seals. All buffs, including those from geomancy spells, will be lost as this is a Sub-Job restricted fight. You may call trusts after you pop the NM, but before attacking it. It won't attack you, until you attack in some manner, such as Geo-Malaise.

nodes.title: After defeating the Burgeoning Flames, check the Primordial Convergeance to receive your reward.
nodes.description: After defeating the Burgeoning Flames, check the Primordial Convergeance to receive your reward. If this is your first Limit Break quest, your level limit is raised to 75. You receive 3000 bayld.

nodes.title: Speaking with Bataron at (H-7) at Frontier Bivouac #2 to begin the quest.
nodes.description: Speaking with Bataron at (H-7) at Frontier Bivouac #2 to begin the quest.

nodes.title: Go just north of the bivouac and kill 8 Belaboring Wasps.
nodes.description: Go just north of the bivouac and kill 8 Belaboring Wasps. If you change areas, your kill count resets to zero.

nodes.title: Return to Bataron to receive your reward.
nodes.description: Return to Bataron to receive your reward.

nodes.title: Speak to Octavien at (I-8) of Eastern Adoulin as a level 66+ Rune Fencer to begin the quest and rece
nodes.description: Speak to Octavien at (I-8) of Eastern Adoulin as a level 66+ Rune Fencer to begin the quest and receive an "Ephemeral Endeavor". If you fail the upcoming fight, simply talk to Octavien again for another "Ephemeral Endeavor"

nodes.title: Go to (F-7) in Eastern Adoulin and enter Rala Waterways .
nodes.description: Go to (F-7) in Eastern Adoulin and enter Rala Waterways .

nodes.title: Head to (M-6) in the eastern portion of Rala Waterways.
nodes.description: Head to (M-6) in the eastern portion of Rala Waterways.

nodes.title: At the Watergarden Coliseum, speak to Yeggha Dolashi.
nodes.description: At the Watergarden Coliseum, speak to Yeggha Dolashi.

nodes.title: Click the Entrance: Coliseum behind her and select "Endeavoring to Awaken" to enter Rala Waterways (
nodes.description: Click the Entrance: Coliseum behind her and select "Endeavoring to Awaken" to enter Rala Waterways (U). Despite the text prompt about other party members, you must enter solo. You must be on Rune Fencer as your main job to be able to enter the battlefield.

nodes.title: You have 10 minutes to defeat the two Rune Fencers inside.
nodes.description: You have 10 minutes to defeat the two Rune Fencers inside. Trust Magic cannot be used inside, unless if you are in possession of the Rhapsody in Umber, which is acquired from the Rhapsodies of Vana'diel Missions: A Land After Time, then you can use Trust Magic in any level 70 limit break fight including this one.

nodes.title: First you face Zurko-Bazurko, an aggressive but relatively weak Rune Fencer with about 1000 HP.
nodes.description: First you face Zurko-Bazurko, an aggressive but relatively weak Rune Fencer with about 1000 HP.

nodes.title: After beating Zurko-Bazurko, head to the main arena and defeat Sverdhried ???, a much stronger Rune
nodes.description: After beating Zurko-Bazurko, head to the main arena and defeat Sverdhried ???, a much stronger Rune Fencer. Sverdhried ??? is not aggressive. If you fall against Sverdhried ??? after besting Zurko-Bazurko, you will not have to fight him again. The bridge to the middle will be available at the start.

nodes.title: After beating Sverdhried ???, you receive the "Enlightened Endeavor" from Braga.
nodes.description: After beating Sverdhried ???, you receive the "Enlightened Endeavor" from Braga.

nodes.title: Return to Octavien at (I-8) in Eastern Adoulin for your reward.
nodes.description: Return to Octavien at (I-8) in Eastern Adoulin for your reward. If this is your first Limit Break quest, your level limit is raised to 75. If you have already completed another Limit Break quest, you still receive the 3000 bayld.

nodes.title: Speak to Octavernost (K-9) (Big Bridge Waypoint) in Western Adoulin as a Rune Fencer (he's NOT the s
nodes.description: Speak to Octavernost (K-9) (Big Bridge Waypoint) in Western Adoulin as a Rune Fencer (he's NOT the same NPC from RUN job quest).

nodes.title: Go to Outer Ra'Kaznar (M-6) and check the Meeting Point for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Go to Outer Ra'Kaznar (M-6) and check the Meeting Point for a cutscene. You will receive Refined Ra'Kaznar fiber.

nodes.title: Return to Octavernost.
nodes.description: Return to Octavernost. He will offer you the choice of three challenges. Each challenge is progressively more difficult than the last. Each fight takes place at one of the three inactive Strange Apparatuses in Vana'diel. Choosing Iridal core of the tomb corresponds to a level 109 solo fight in King Ranperre's Tomb. Choosing Iridal core of the ruins corresponds to a level 125 Solo fight in Fei'Yin. Choosing the blank option will give you the Iridal core of the pass. This corresponds to a level 135 solo Rune Fencer fight in Ranguemont Pass.

nodes.title: Talk to Flapano (I-8).
nodes.description: Talk to Flapano (I-8). He needs 2 Barnacles, 1 pinch of Saffron, and 1 Mussel.

nodes.title: Trade the ingredients to Flapano for your reward.
nodes.description: Trade the ingredients to Flapano for your reward.

nodes.title: Talk to Behsa Alehgo at (J-8) in Eastern Adoulin for a cutscene with Erfimia and Rigobertine.
nodes.description: Talk to Behsa Alehgo at (J-8) in Eastern Adoulin for a cutscene with Erfimia and Rigobertine.

nodes.title: Obtain Holy Water x12.
nodes.description: Obtain Holy Water x12.

nodes.title: Go to the main Frontier Station in Yorcia Weald; Head south to (J-9) and hug the right wall to loop
nodes.description: Go to the main Frontier Station in Yorcia Weald; Head south to (J-9) and hug the right wall to loop around back up to (J-8). You'll find the Suspicious Place at the southwest most corner of (J-8) behind a tree. Click on it for a cutscene with Erfimia, Robertioux, and Frondeaubaire.

nodes.title: Go to the "Obstructing Bush", blocking a walkway.
nodes.description: Go to the "Obstructing Bush", blocking a walkway. It will be OPEN ONLY between the times 21:00 and 3:00. Check the Suspicious Place at (I-8), which is just south of the Ergon Locus in the area and trade the stack (12) of Holy Water for a cutscene with Erfimia, Robertioux, Reepi-Molpi, and Frondeaubaire. To get there: From Frontier Bivouac #1 in Yorcia Weald and zigzag south. From Frontier Bivouac #2 in Yorcia Weald head northwest and then zigzag north. Note: If you have Frontier Bivouac #3 in Yorcia Weald you won't need to do any reives to get to (I-8) and the Suspicious Place.

nodes.title: Travel to southwest corner of (H-9), near a Lost Article spawn point among Luckybugs, and check the
nodes.description: Travel to southwest corner of (H-9), near a Lost Article spawn point among Luckybugs, and check the third Suspicious Place for the final cutscene with Erfimia, Robertioux, Reepi-Molpi, and Frondeaubaire and your reward. To get there you can either: From Frontier Bivouac #2 in Yorcia Weald head northwest. Head south towards (H-9) by doubling back, if you came from Frontier Bivouac #2. Note: Picture uploaded here is to aid you knowing exactly where you need to be at.

nodes.title: Talk to Clautaire near the Western Adoulin Rent-a-Room, who notices your F.A.I.L.
nodes.description: Talk to Clautaire near the Western Adoulin Rent-a-Room, who notices your F.A.I.L. badge and makes a request of you.

nodes.title: Excavate the Mineral Vein in your Mog Garden to obtain a Hunk of bedrock.
nodes.description: Excavate the Mineral Vein in your Mog Garden to obtain a Hunk of bedrock.

nodes.title: Return to Clautaire for your reward.
nodes.description: Return to Clautaire for your reward.

nodes.title: Enter Rala Waterways from (I-12) in Western Adoulin and speak with Chalvava at (F-11).
nodes.description: Enter Rala Waterways from (I-12) in Western Adoulin and speak with Chalvava at (F-11).

nodes.title: Speak with Shipilolo at the Inventors' Coalition in Western Adoulin for a Bottle of Fertilizer X.
nodes.description: Speak with Shipilolo at the Inventors' Coalition in Western Adoulin for a Bottle of Fertilizer X.

nodes.title: Once you have the bottle, return to Chalvava to complete the quest.
nodes.description: Once you have the bottle, return to Chalvava to complete the quest.

nodes.title: Speak to Berghent, an old man sitting on the ground at (J-9) in Western Adoulin.
nodes.description: Speak to Berghent, an old man sitting on the ground at (J-9) in Western Adoulin.

nodes.title: Speak to Masad at (G-10) in Western Adoulin's Mummers' Coalition for a cutscene with Teodor.
nodes.description: Speak to Masad at (G-10) in Western Adoulin's Mummers' Coalition for a cutscene with Teodor.

nodes.title: Next, speak to Dewalt at (G-7) in Western Adoulin's Couriers' Coalition for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Next, speak to Dewalt at (G-7) in Western Adoulin's Couriers' Coalition for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Go to (I-12) of Western Adoulin to enter the Rala Waterways and speak to Chalvava at (F-11) for a cu
nodes.description: Go to (I-12) of Western Adoulin to enter the Rala Waterways and speak to Chalvava at (F-11) for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Harvest a Blightberry from a harvesting point in Yahse Hunting Grounds.
nodes.description: Harvest a Blightberry from a harvesting point in Yahse Hunting Grounds.

nodes.title: Return to Berghent to complete the quest and receive your reward.
nodes.description: Return to Berghent to complete the quest and receive your reward. At this point, players are free to continue progress on Budding Prospects.

nodes.title: Zone after completing Dirt Cheap, then return and talk to Mano-Amano at the Frontier Station in Yorc
nodes.description: Zone after completing Dirt Cheap, then return and talk to Mano-Amano at the Frontier Station in Yorcia Weald to begin the quest.

nodes.title: Defeat 3 Numbing Blossoms in Yorcia Weald.
nodes.description: Defeat 3 Numbing Blossoms in Yorcia Weald. There are exactly three blossoms in the area just northwest of the Frontier Station, guarded by only two Snapweeds which are trivial to solo with 119 gear + Trusts.

nodes.title: Return to Mano-Amano for your reward.
nodes.description: Return to Mano-Amano for your reward.

nodes.title: Examine "Door: Svenja's Manor" northeast of the fountain located at Western Adoulin (I-8) for a cuts
nodes.description: Examine "Door: Svenja's Manor" northeast of the fountain located at Western Adoulin (I-8) for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Enter the Celennia Memorial Library (Eastern Adoulin G-10) by speaking to Eppel-Treppel for another
nodes.description: Enter the Celennia Memorial Library (Eastern Adoulin G-10) by speaking to Eppel-Treppel for another cutscene.

nodes.title: Travel to Foret de Hennetiel and harvest until you get a Hennebloom leaf.
nodes.description: Travel to Foret de Hennetiel and harvest until you get a Hennebloom leaf. The key item is not guaranteed on your first successful harvest. See discussion for more details on known locations. Harvesting for key items is easier with a full inventory. You will not become fatigued, and so will not have a limit on harvesting attempts. You will still become fatigued from harvesting actions, even with full inventory.

nodes.title: Return to "Door: Svenja's Manor" to complete the quest and collect your reward.
nodes.description: Return to "Door: Svenja's Manor" to complete the quest and collect your reward.

nodes.title: NOTE: Should you not have your original handbell on you, she may ask you to purchase a new one for 3
nodes.description: NOTE: Should you not have your original handbell on you, she may ask you to purchase a new one for 300,000 gil or 150,000 baylds. Quit the dialog and try again for the quest.

nodes.title: Speak to Sylvie for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Speak to Sylvie for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Travel to Eastern Adoulin and speak to Nhili Uvolep at (I-7) (Sverdhried Hillock waypoint) for a cut
nodes.description: Travel to Eastern Adoulin and speak to Nhili Uvolep at (I-7) (Sverdhried Hillock waypoint) for a cutscene with Lhaiso Neftereh, Sylvie, Hemborok, Gregoirellaud, and Obelailai. If she gives you the Trial Wand for the trial WS quest Geomancerrific, talk to her several more times until you receive the correct cutscene. Zoning should not be necessary.

nodes.title: Go to the Frontier Station in Morimar Basalt Fields (K-10) and Speak to Vestavius at the station to
nodes.description: Go to the Frontier Station in Morimar Basalt Fields (K-10) and Speak to Vestavius at the station to learn about a problem with an Ergon Locus.

nodes.title: Examine the "Ergon Locus ???" at the north-west corner of (J-6) which is accessible by traveling eas
nodes.description: Examine the "Ergon Locus ???" at the north-west corner of (J-6) which is accessible by traveling east from Bivouac #2, for a cutscene and obtain a Silver luopan.

nodes.title: (Do not confuse this for the Ergon Locus near the Geo 75 Cap Fight's "Primordial Convergence", it's
nodes.description: (Do not confuse this for the Ergon Locus near the Geo 75 Cap Fight's "Primordial Convergence", it's not that one.)

nodes.title: Do not attempt this on a low geared 99 Geo even with trusts the NM can kill you, bring your best gea
nodes.description: Do not attempt this on a low geared 99 Geo even with trusts the NM can kill you, bring your best geared job with trusts.

nodes.title: Examine the Ergon Locus ??? a second time to spawn a Deranged Ameretat.
nodes.description: Examine the Ergon Locus ??? a second time to spawn a Deranged Ameretat. The Ameretat primarily uses Sweet Breath and Bad Breath. It is also capable of using WILL ONLY USE Extremely Bad Breath under 50%, but the cast time is long enough to run out of range. The NM has very high magic evasion and magic damage reduction and is immune to nearly all enfeebles including Stun. Using pets and range trusts (Tenzen II and Semih Lafihna) is a winning method.

nodes.title: Upon defeating the Deranged Ameretat, examine the Ergon Locus ??? a third time for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Upon defeating the Deranged Ameretat, examine the Ergon Locus ??? a third time for a cutscene. You will lose the Silver luopan.

nodes.title: Return to Sylvie in Western Adoulin for a cutscene and your rewards.
nodes.description: Return to Sylvie in Western Adoulin for a cutscene and your rewards.

nodes.title: You must wait a game day before beginning the next quest.
nodes.description: You must wait a game day before beginning the next quest.

nodes.title: Speak with Octavien as a 90+ Rune Fencer to start the quest.
nodes.description: Speak with Octavien as a 90+ Rune Fencer to start the quest. You must zone after completing Endeavoring to Awaken. You no longer need to be a Rune Fencer after the initial conversation.

nodes.title: Talk to Gaddiux at (J-10), near the Inventors' Coalition in Western Adoulin, to learn you must find
nodes.description: Talk to Gaddiux at (J-10), near the Inventors' Coalition in Western Adoulin, to learn you must find Yestin-Ovestin. If he gives you the Trial blade for the trial WS quest Rune Fencing the Night Away, talk to him another time to receive the dialog about a smith. Zoning is not necessary.

nodes.title: Head to (I-4) by the Adoulin Waterfront in Western Adoulin, and just past Kongramm, there is an alle
nodes.description: Head to (I-4) by the Adoulin Waterfront in Western Adoulin, and just past Kongramm, there is an alley way with an Inconspicuous Barrel. Click it for a cutscene with Yestin-Ovestin.

nodes.title: Check the Tomato Vantage Point in the Arboretum in Rala Waterways (E-10).
nodes.description: Check the Tomato Vantage Point in the Arboretum in Rala Waterways (E-10). The fastest way is from the Rent-a-Room waypoint in Western Adoulin). From there, head south-east and down the ramp.

nodes.title: Upon meeting Jerra Ndala, ask her about the sword and the items needed.
nodes.description: Upon meeting Jerra Ndala, ask her about the sword and the items needed.

nodes.title: Trade either a Sowilo Claymore or an Elixir to the Tomato Vantage Point to get a Rune saber.
nodes.description: Trade either a Sowilo Claymore or an Elixir to the Tomato Vantage Point to get a Rune saber.

nodes.title: Ask for Frost-encrusted flame gem to receive a Flask of fruiserum.
nodes.description: Ask for Frost-encrusted flame gem to receive a Flask of fruiserum.

nodes.title: As a level 99 Geomancer, speak to Nhili Uvolep at (I-7) in Eastern Adoulin to receive a Trial Wand.
nodes.description: As a level 99 Geomancer, speak to Nhili Uvolep at (I-7) in Eastern Adoulin to receive a Trial Wand.

nodes.title: Equip the Trial Wand in your main hand and perform weapon skills with it to obtain Weapon Skill Poin
nodes.description: Equip the Trial Wand in your main hand and perform weapon skills with it to obtain Weapon Skill Points. 300 Weapon Skill Points are needed. Trust: Ayame uses weapon skills that elementally coordinate with the weapon skill last used by a player, functioning as a skillchain initiator. She is extremely convenient for quests that involve performing skillchains. [1] If you use Black Halo, Trust: Ayame begins using Tachi: Kasha every time both you and Ayame have at least 1000 TP, allowing you to perform frequent Light (Skillchain)s for maximum WS points. If you choose this option, be sure to pick targets of reasonable strength. Marjami Ravine or Yorcia Weald may be good options. Bight Uragnites right outside of Western Adoulin work well due to their extremely high physical defense. An excellent setup is to have Trust: Ayame and non-combative support Trusts fight with you against Serpopard Ninlil via Unity NM. Trust: Cherukiki keeps Haste active on the player. The Espial Gambison Set is recommended for an easy-to-acquire, Item level 117 melee DD set for Geomancer.

nodes.title: Once you have acquired enough Weapon Skill points, you will see Exudation available under your list
nodes.description: Once you have acquired enough Weapon Skill points, you will see Exudation available under your list of weapon skills, but only while your Trial Wand is equipped. There will be no message in the chat log informing you of this; it will simply appear in the list.

nodes.title: Trade your unlocked Trial Wand back to Nhili Uvolep to fully unlock Exudation for use with any club
nodes.description: Trade your unlocked Trial Wand back to Nhili Uvolep to fully unlock Exudation for use with any club (as Geomancer).

nodes.title: *Player's Note : After finishing Researchers from the West, the first time you zone and try to speak
nodes.description: *Player's Note : After finishing Researchers from the West, the first time you zone and try to speak with Alienor , she may end up rewarding you with 1000 experience/limit points, 500 bayld, and 3000 Kinetic Units for helping her Grandfather (not sure why that happened but hope it works for everyone else). Talk to her again to begin the quest. - glenwo2 (Warrior - lvl 99) (02-29-20 - 10:53 am EST)

nodes.title: Talk to Alienor at Western Adoulin (E-8).
nodes.description: Talk to Alienor at Western Adoulin (E-8). You will receive Tray of Adoulinian delicacies.

nodes.title: Go to Ru'Lude Gardens (G-9) and speak to Anastase to obtain a Small bag of Adoulinian delicacies.
nodes.description: Go to Ru'Lude Gardens (G-9) and speak to Anastase to obtain a Small bag of Adoulinian delicacies

nodes.description: Participate in at least one Colonization Reive, then return to Elmric to receive the "Logging" key item, which allows you to damage Knotted Roots during Colonization Reives. You do not have to see the battle through to completion or receive an evaluation; you only need to participate. You can participate in a Reive before speaking with Elmric, causing the quest to both start and end with the same dialogue.

nodes.description: Complete the mission: Helina

nodes.description: Talk to Toppled Tree at the site of the Frontier Station in Marjami Ravine M-7, who asks for a Large strip of Velkk hide.

nodes.title: Travel to the eastern, lower level of (K-10).
nodes.description: Travel to the eastern, lower level of (K-10). Biv #1 is the closest waypoint. Otherwise this requires passing through three colonization reives (L-9, K-8, and K-11) on the way there that require "Demolishing" to win.

nodes.title: Examine the Velkk cache to obtain the Large strip of Velkk hide.
nodes.description: Examine the Velkk cache to obtain the Large strip of Velkk hide. The target is near a Velkk hut in the eastern part of K-10.

nodes.description: Return to Toppled Tree at (M-7) and give him the Large strip of Velkk hide.

nodes.title: Travel southwest from Toppled Tree to the border of (K-7/8) (Its a short distance away immediately t
nodes.description: Travel southwest from Toppled Tree to the border of (K-7/8) (Its a short distance away immediately to the path southwest in the same area) and examine the Scalable Area vine target for a cutscene which completes the quest and rewards the "Climbing" survival skill, which allows players to climb up and down vines throughout Ulbuka by interacting with Scalable Area targets at either end. You are now able to climb vines in East Ulbuka Territory by examining Scalable Areas. Note that some vines are not scalable yet.

nodes.description: Speak with Chya Mindorah at Bivouac # 1 in Yahse Hunting Grounds to get the quest.

nodes.description: Kill Calfcleaving Chapuli until you receive the message, "The smell of bloodlust hangs thick in the air!" The number of kills seems to vary greatly before message appears.

nodes.description: Check the ??? to spawn a Bothersome Chapuli. Slay it to obtain a Chapuli horn.

nodes.description: Return to Chya Mindorah at (I-8).

nodes.description: Obtain a Frost Turnip and Slime Oil and trade them to Wegellion. Frost Turnips can be obtained from a variety of sources, including from the Garden Furrows in Mog Garden when Vegetable Seeds are planted, from Snowpelt Rabbits in Kamihr Drifts, and from various merchants.

nodes.description: Return to (I-8) Western Adoulin and check Door: Svenja's Manor for final cutscene and reward.

nodes.description: Talk to Choubollet at the frontier station, who asks for 3 squares of Dhalmel Leather, 1 Umbril Ooze, and 1 Twitherym Scale.

nodes.title: Collect the items and trade them to Choubollet to receive a Watercraft, allowing you to continue the
nodes.description: Collect the items and trade them to Choubollet to receive a Watercraft, allowing you to continue the quest.

nodes.title: Head to the south side of (I-7).
nodes.description: Head to the south side of (I-7). Cast off and you will end up at the southern island at (J-9). If you choose to "Dive right in...", you'll receive a brief cutscene and the unique title Toxin Tussler. If you have already cast off once, you can return to the initial cast off point and the option will be available once again. If you do not choose this option before completing the quest, you will no longer be able to get the title. Beware that the Zoldeff Jagil where you land will aggro a level 99 character. If you call Alter Egos before you cast off, they will arrive on the island with you. Sneak stays on during boat rides too. NOTE! The "River Mouth" spawns an NM Crab. It is NOT related to this quest! If you need it, you activate Frontier Bivouac #2 before heading out to cast off as described below.

nodes.title: Go to the west side of (J-9) (a different beach) to cast off again and you will be transported to th
nodes.description: Go to the west side of (J-9) (a different beach) to cast off again and you will be transported to the north side of the river at (J-9).

nodes.title: Head north from the second landing point to return to Choubollet and receive your reward.
nodes.description: Head north from the second landing point to return to Choubollet and receive your reward.

nodes.description: Speak to Behsa Alehgo (J-8) Eastern Adoulin for a scene with her and Rigobertine.

nodes.description: Enter the Celennia Memorial Library for a cutscene with Erfimia, Robertioux, and Frondeaubaire.

nodes.title: Go to Frontier Bivouac #1 in Yorcia Weald; then, head to the clearing at (I-8) that is filled with N
nodes.description: Go to Frontier Bivouac #1 in Yorcia Weald; then, head to the clearing at (I-8) that is filled with Numbing Blossoms. Here, at (I-8), examine the Suspicious Place for a cutscene with Erfimia, Robertioux, and Jovial Ahriman.

nodes.title: Check Suspicious Place again to spawn Jovial Ahriman.
nodes.description: Check Suspicious Place again to spawn Jovial Ahriman. Jovial Ahriman uses most Ahriman abilities, including Eyes On Me, Airy Shield, and Magic Barrier. He also uses Cruel Joke when low on HP to doom the entire party. For this reason, it is highly recommended to have Reraise and/or to examine the spot again very quickly after beating the NM. Note: This NM is highly resistant to damage, it is strongly advised you bring fast-hard damage as "doom" will wipe anyone taking too long to kill it.

nodes.title: Defeat the ahriman and check the Suspicious Place again for another cutscene.
nodes.description: Defeat the ahriman and check the Suspicious Place again for another cutscene.

nodes.description: Travel to Pool of Clarity at (G-6) in Yorcia Weald and check the Pellucid Afflusion for a final cutscene with Robertioux, Erfimia, Araustoix, and your reward.

nodes.description: Talk to Veldeth near the Frontier Station in Marjami Ravine (L-7).

nodes.description: Enter Rala Waterways via (J-12) in Western Adoulin. Sneak and Invisible are not necessary.

nodes.description: Return to Saldinor and trade the two Twitherym Wings for your reward.

nodes.description: Start this quest by selecting the Door: Research Chamber at (J-8) in Eastern Adoulin. The "black mandragora" Erisa refers to is the Pinetorum in the Yahse Hunting Grounds. One Pinetorum camp is near (J-9).

nodes.description: Defeat Pinetorum until you obtain Yahse Humus. You can also purchase the humus in the auction house under Misc.

nodes.title: Trade the Yahse Humus to the Door: Research Chamber for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Trade the Yahse Humus to the Door: Research Chamber for a cutscene.

nodes.description: Head to Western Adoulin and enter the Rala Waterways at (I-12).

nodes.description: Once there, go to the Civic Arboretum at (F-10/F-11). Inspect the Alluring Plant targets until you find the one Dworvigg described. After a cutscene, you receive a Tiny seed. The plant you are looking for has bulky leaves, and fruit covered in a hard shell. They are in the northwest block of plants, facing the white 'carrot' like plants.

nodes.title: Take your Tiny seed back to the Door: Research Chamber for a cutscene and your reward.
nodes.description: Take your Tiny seed back to the Door: Research Chamber for a cutscene and your reward.

nodes.title: After completing Forging New Bonds, you must zone to flag this quest.
nodes.description: After completing Forging New Bonds, you must zone to flag this quest.

nodes.title: Speak to Octavien for a cut scene and obtain the Letter from Octavien..
nodes.description: Speak to Octavien for a cut scene and obtain the Letter from Octavien..

nodes.title: Talk to Ohruru (E-7, Port Windurst inside the Orastery).
nodes.description: Talk to Ohruru (E-7, Port Windurst inside the Orastery).

nodes.title: Use Ignis once and then speak to Ohruru again.
nodes.description: Use Ignis once and then speak to Ohruru again. If you do not get a cutscene, speak once more to Ohruru.

nodes.title: Head to 3 of the 8 active Strange Apparatuses and click on the Hazy Rune.
nodes.description: Head to 3 of the 8 active Strange Apparatuses and click on the Hazy Rune. Once you use the corresponding Rune, click on it again to obtain its key item. You will walk through fake walls to reach the Strange Apparatuses. The walls are not marked on the in-game maps, so use the Wiki maps to guide you. At The Eldieme Necropolis, Map 2 (K-13), use Ignis x3 and collect the Stone of Ignis. When dropping down from Map 1, use the center north drop at (G-9), do not use the center hole. At Dangruf Wadi (E-11), use Unda x3 and collect the Stone of Unda. At Ordelle's Caves, Map 1 (E-12), use Gelus x3 and collect the Stone of Gelus. At Gusgen Mines, Map 2 (J-5), use Flabra x3 and collect the Stone of Flabra. At Outer Horutoto Ruins, Map 2 (E-6), use Tellus x3 and collect the Stone of Tellus. The entrance is at West Sarutabaruta (G-4), near the Outpost/Survival Guide. The fastest way there is to teleport using Proto Waypoints. At Maze of Shakhrami, Map 2 (L-10), zone in from Buburimu Peninsula (F-6), use Lux x3 and collect the Stone of Lux. At Garlaige Citadel, Map 3 (K-8), use Tenebrae x3 and collect the Stone of Tenebrae. The Apparatus is past Banishing Gate #2. At Crawlers' Nest, Map 3 (K-8), use Sulpor x3 and collect the Stone of Sulpor. Note: You only need 3 stones, the rest are optional, but increase your reward by 2,000 bayld each at the end of the quest.

nodes.title: Optional: There are 3 remaining Strange Apparatuses that provide key items, but do not count towards
nodes.description: Optional: There are 3 remaining Strange Apparatuses that provide key items, but do not count towards the 3 stone requirement. They do count towards your final Bayld reward. King Ranperre's Tomb, Map 2 (E-7). The Rune Cipher is Gelus, Sulpor, and Unda, in order. You will receive Stone of Unknown Runic Origins. Ranguemont Pass (E-4). The Rune Cipher is Flabra, Ignis, and Lux, in order. You will receive Stone of Unknown Runic Origins. Fei'Yin, Map 1 (G-6). Only accessible through the basement. The Rune Cipher is Ignis, Tellus, and Tenebrae, in order. You will receive Stone of Unknown Runic Origins.

nodes.title: Talk to Ohruru who will immediately quiz you on your knowledge of Rune Enchantment and Ward effects.
nodes.description: Talk to Ohruru who will immediately quiz you on your knowledge of Rune Enchantment and Ward effects. The number of questions is determined at random. You have ten seconds to answer each question. You must correctly answer all of her questions to pass the quiz She can ask the same question multiple times.

nodes.title: Answer her questions based on the following patterns: Q: Do you happen to know what number question
nodes.description: Answer her questions based on the following patterns: Q: Do you happen to know what number question this is?(Tip: Start counting questions from the start).

nodes.title: Talk to Lerene, who asks for 2 squares of Ancestral Cloth.
nodes.description: Talk to Lerene, who asks for 2 squares of Ancestral Cloth. Ancestral Cloth is dropped by the Fomors in Outer Ra'Kaznar, but can also be auctioned and bazaared. Use Wide Scan to locate enemies whose names begin with "Shunned". These enemies can drop the cloth. Using some form of Treasure Hunter, even Trust: Lion or Trust: Nanaa Mihgo, is recommended.

nodes.title: Collect the items and trade them to Lerene for a cutscene, Lerene's paten, "Pulverizing", and 500 ba
nodes.description: Collect the items and trade them to Lerene for a cutscene, Lerene's paten, "Pulverizing", and 500 bayld.

nodes.title: Talk to Sharuru for a Waypoint scanner kit.
nodes.description: Talk to Sharuru for a Waypoint scanner kit.

nodes.title: Examine EVERY waypoint in Western Adoulin.
nodes.description: Examine EVERY waypoint in Western Adoulin. You can check them by warping to them, then examining them. It doesn't matter if the waypoints are infected or not, you must check all of them.

nodes.title: Return to Sharuru for your reward.
nodes.description: Return to Sharuru for your reward.

nodes.description: Go to Eastern Adoulin (J-8) and talk Rigobertine for a cutscene with Ingrid, Faustoise, Marcellurin and Hildebert, and to obtain a Purple purgation cloth.

nodes.title: Go to Yorcia Weald (G-6) and examine "Suspicious Roots" for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Go to Yorcia Weald (G-6) and examine "Suspicious Roots" for a cutscene. Nearest Bivouac is #1.

nodes.title: Examine the roots again to enter the battlefield "Mistress of Ceremonies.".
nodes.description: Examine the roots again to enter the battlefield "Mistress of Ceremonies."

nodes.title: Talk to Peladi Shalmohr.
nodes.description: Talk to Peladi Shalmohr. After a lengthy monologue she will ask you if you want to take on a job as "manager". Accept the honors and she will send you on a quest to find some missing comedians.

nodes.title: Head to J-11 (Western Adoulin on top of some boxes) and click on the Mischief Marker for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Head to J-11 (Western Adoulin on top of some boxes) and click on the Mischief Marker for a cutscene. Note before continuing: The nearby NPC Ansegusele (I-11) sells Faerie Apple and Popoto. Kanil at (K-8) Western Adoulin sells Olive Oil.

nodes.title: You will be asked to acquire the ingredients to make a Baked Popoto.
nodes.description: You will be asked to acquire the ingredients to make a Baked Popoto. Keep trading (all at the same time) the following items to the Mischief Marker until they are successful: Fire Crystal Selbina Butter Popoto

nodes.title: You will then be asked to acquire the ingredients to make a Dhalmel Steak.
nodes.description: You will then be asked to acquire the ingredients to make a Dhalmel Steak. Keep trading the following items to the Mischief Marker until they are successful: Fire Crystal Dhalmel Meat Black Pepper Olive Oil

nodes.title: You will then be asked to acquire the ingredients to make a Baked Apple.
nodes.description: You will then be asked to acquire the ingredients to make a Baked Apple. Keep trading the following items to the Mischief Marker until they are successful: Fire Crystal Faerie Apple Selbina Butter Maple Sugar Cinnamon

nodes.title: After the final cutscene, you receive 900 experience points.
nodes.description: After the final cutscene, you receive 900 experience points.

nodes.description: Travel to (K-10) Kamihr Drifts Frontier Station and speak to Peppe-Aleppe to activate the quest.

nodes.description: Obtain a Ruszor Hide and trade it to Peppe-Aleppe for your reward. Drops from Slobbering Ruszor that spawn in the dead end at (J-7) in Kamihr Drifts. Slobbering Ruszor perform an ability called Terrorizing Roar that, as it's name suggests, has an AoE Terror effect. Occurs frequently at low HP.

nodes.description: Go to Eastern Adoulin (J-8) and speak with Rigobertine for a cutscene with Ingrid and Marcellurin.

nodes.description: Go to (G-7) and approach Oscairn for a cutscene with Gratzigg and Ingrid.

nodes.description: Go to Frontier Bivouac #1 (NOT the station) in Yorcia Weald; then, head to the clearing at (I-8) that is filled with Numbing Blossoms.

nodes.description: Examine the "Ergon Locus ???" at (I-8) for a cutscene with Morimar and Ingrid.

nodes.description: Return to Eastern Adoulin (G-7) and approach Oscairn for a cutscene.

nodes.description: Enter Morimar Basalt Fields and talk to Hegnor located at the Frontier Station (K-10).

nodes.description: Head to K-8 and click on the ??? under a tree on the cliffside during icy weather to obtain a Rime ice fragment. Be sure to have Sneak for the nearby Qohanyks and Invisible for the nocturnal Snowcap Umbrils nearby.

nodes.title: Once you have obtained the key item, return to Hegnor for your reward.
nodes.description: Once you have obtained the key item, return to Hegnor for your reward.

nodes.description: Wait one Vana'diel day then examine Door: Svenja's Manor (I-8) in Western Adoulin for a scene with Lhe Lhangavo, Svenja, Chalvava, Othellius, and Logan.

The NM is not very powerful against high item levels and trusts. She died in a few seconds to one Volt Strike and then a flurry of magic bursts from Trust: Arciela II and Trust: Shantotto II. Uses TP move Bloody Breath (50 tick doom counter).

nodes.description: Check the Foreboding Vineprints again after defeating the NM for a cutscene with Logan, Borghest, Othellius, Donda-Bonda, and Jaureche.

nodes.description: Travel to Western Adoulin (I-9) and examine Door: Hospital for your reward and the final cutscene with Margret, Alianne, and the others.

nodes.title: Talk to Nestroh to start the quest.
nodes.description: Talk to Nestroh to start the quest. (Bivouac #3) "Watercrafting" and a Watercraft are required to reach him unless Broadleaf Palms are cleared in Colonization Reives.

nodes.description: Fish up and defeat a Delectable Orobon, which always drops a Delectable Orobon Steak. The steak will be of a randomly selected cut: tail, stomach, cheeks, back, or liver.

nodes.title: Return to Nestroh, and trade the Delectable Orobon Steak to determine your steak cut.
nodes.description: Return to Nestroh, and trade the Delectable Orobon Steak to determine your steak cut. Only cuts from the liver will finish the quest. All other cuts will be deemed not good enough and will require you to try again. It is possible to receive multiples of any unwanted cut type throughout the quest.

nodes.title: Talk to Fritha at the Frontier Station (J-7); she will ask you to check water in the Zoldeff River.
nodes.description: Talk to Fritha at the Frontier Station (J-7); she will ask you to check water in the Zoldeff River. Go to (J-9) North side to find the "River Mouth". Head South past / through the Lair Reive. Examine it to spawn the NM Cunning Craklaw.

nodes.title: Kill it and then check the "River Mouth" again to obtain a Vial of toxic Zoldeff water.
nodes.description: Kill it and then check the "River Mouth" again to obtain a Vial of toxic Zoldeff water.

nodes.title: Return to Fritha for your reward.
nodes.description: Return to Fritha for your reward.

nodes.title: Talk to Gaddiux (J-10) in Western Adoulin.
nodes.description: Talk to Gaddiux (J-10) in Western Adoulin.

nodes.title: Obtain a Pickaxe.
nodes.description: Obtain a Pickaxe. Go to Yorcia Weald (I-8) and check the ???. When your "Enlightened Endeavor" resonates, trade a pickaxe to it. You will obtain Numbing blossom seed. Attempt to dig deeper. Trade another pickaxe to it, then do not give up. You will obtain Broken rapier hilt.

nodes.title: Return to Gaddiux.
nodes.description: Return to Gaddiux.

nodes.title: Talk to Runje Desaali (J-11) in Eastern Adoulin.
nodes.description: Talk to Runje Desaali (J-11) in Eastern Adoulin. She will begin tracking materials deposited towards your Rune Fencer Ergon Weapon, Epeolatry. If you are working towards an Idris, you will need to complete or quit that weapon to begin working on Epeolatry. You will lose all materials deposited if you quit, but you will keep your Rusted handbell and can restart it immediately.

nodes.title: Talk to Pagnelle for the starting cutscene.
nodes.description: Talk to Pagnelle for the starting cutscene.

nodes.title: Talk to Gontrain at (H-12) by the rent-a-rooms to trigger a cutscene with Ilney.
nodes.description: Talk to Gontrain at (H-12) by the rent-a-rooms to trigger a cutscene with Ilney.

nodes.title: Return to Pagnelle who asks you to collect 3 Rockberries, which can be harvested using a sickle at H
nodes.description: Return to Pagnelle who asks you to collect 3 Rockberries, which can be harvested using a sickle at Harvesting Points out in Ceizak Battlegrounds, Yahse Hunting Grounds, or Foret de Hennetiel. Bring several sickles (because they break regularly), but the Rockberries should be the first 3 items you harvest. Possible Harvesting Points: Yahse Hunting Grounds - K-6 (NE corner), H-6 (NE corner), F-10, G-10, I-5, I-8 (lower center) Ceizak Battlegrounds - I-9 (dead end area), G-10, F-9 (Waypoint #3), F-10 (east side) Foret de Hennetiel - J-7, I-7

nodes.title: Return again to Pagnelle to trigger another cutscene.
nodes.description: Return again to Pagnelle to trigger another cutscene.

nodes.title: Enter the Rala Waterways from (J-12) in Western Adoulin and head to (E-11) to trigger another cutsce
nodes.description: Enter the Rala Waterways from (J-12) in Western Adoulin and head to (E-11) to trigger another cutscene a few steps up the ramp. (J-12) entrance is near the Mog House

nodes.title: After the cutscene in Rala Waterways, return to Pagnelle for a final cutscene and your reward.
nodes.description: After the cutscene in Rala Waterways, return to Pagnelle for a final cutscene and your reward.

nodes.title: After completing the quest, it is possible to watch Vicious Vorahal, Tenacious Tirrod, and Fearless
nodes.description: After completing the quest, it is possible to watch Vicious Vorahal, Tenacious Tirrod, and Fearless Fismar battle in the arena by talking to Yeggha Dolashi at (M-6) in Rala Waterways.

nodes.title: As a level 99 Rune Fencer, speak to Gaddiux at (J-10) in Western Adoulin to receive a Trial Blade.
nodes.description: As a level 99 Rune Fencer, speak to Gaddiux at (J-10) in Western Adoulin to receive a Trial Blade.

nodes.title: Equip the Trial Blade and perform weapon skills with it to obtain Weapon Skill Points.
nodes.description: Equip the Trial Blade and perform weapon skills with it to obtain Weapon Skill Points. 300 Weapon Skill Points are needed. Trust: Ayame uses weapon skills that elementally coordinate with the weapon skill last used by a player, functioning as a skillchain initiator. She is extremely convenient for quests that involve performing skillchains. [1] If you use Resolution, Trust: Ayame begins using Tachi: Kasha every time both you and Ayame have at least 1000 TP, allowing you to perform frequent Light (Skillchain)s for maximum WS points. If you choose this option, be sure to pick targets of reasonable strength. Kamihr Drifts is a good option.

nodes.title: Once you have acquired enough Weapon Skill points, you will see Dimidiation available under your lis
nodes.description: Once you have acquired enough Weapon Skill points, you will see Dimidiation available under your list of weapon skills, but only while your Trial Blade is equipped. There is no message in the chat log informing you of this; it simply appears in the list.

nodes.title: Trade your unlocked Trial Blade back to Gaddiux to obtain 300 bayld and fully unlock Dimidiation for
nodes.description: Trade your unlocked Trial Blade back to Gaddiux to obtain 300 bayld and fully unlock Dimidiation for use with any Great Sword as Rune Fencer.

nodes.title: Complete mission
nodes.description: Complete the mission: Saved by the Bell

nodes.title: Enter the Pioneers' Coalition for a cutscene with Eamonn and Bilp, who request a soil sample from (G
nodes.description: Enter the Pioneers' Coalition for a cutscene with Eamonn and Bilp, who request a soil sample from (G-8) in Ceizak Battlegrounds. You will be given the option to accept or refuse the quest. If you refuse it, you can reaccept it by talking to Eamonn.

nodes.title: Touch the Earthen Mound in the eastern half of (G-8) in Ceizak Battlegrounds to trigger a cutscene w
nodes.description: Touch the Earthen Mound in the eastern half of (G-8) in Ceizak Battlegrounds to trigger a cutscene with Lhe Lhangavo, who tells you to go to Sih Gates.

nodes.title: Enter Sih Gates using the exit located at (E-10) or (G/H-11) in Ceizak Battlegrounds.
nodes.description: Enter Sih Gates using the exit located at (E-10) or (G/H-11) in Ceizak Battlegrounds. Once inside, head to the Foreboding Presence at (E-6) and touch it for a cutscene. To reach this entrance, a Reive (possibly two or more Logging blockages) victory may be necessary to clear some roots from your path.

nodes.title: After the cutscene, touch the Foreboding Presence again to spawn a Fomor Pioneer.
nodes.description: After the cutscene, touch the Foreboding Presence again to spawn a Fomor Pioneer. After defeating the Fomor Pioneer, touch the Foreboding Presence again for another cutscene and a Reive unity.

nodes.title: Return to the Pioneer's Coalition for the final cutscene and your reward.
nodes.description: Return to the Pioneer's Coalition for the final cutscene and your reward.

nodes.title: Wait one Vana'diel day, then examine Door: Svenja's Manor (I-8) in Western Adoulin to meet with Sven
nodes.description: Wait one Vana'diel day, then examine Door: Svenja's Manor (I-8) in Western Adoulin to meet with Svenja and Othellius.

nodes.title: Travel to Yorcia Weald frontier station and speak with Emjook-Renook for a scene with Mano-Amano, Al
nodes.description: Travel to Yorcia Weald frontier station and speak with Emjook-Renook for a scene with Mano-Amano, Alianne, and Borghest.

nodes.title: Travel to Foret de Hennetiel frontier station and speak with Fritha for a scene with Davengrot, Alia
nodes.description: Travel to Foret de Hennetiel frontier station and speak with Fritha for a scene with Davengrot, Alianne, and Deumagneot.

nodes.title: Search Foret de Hennetiel for harvesting points and harvest Hennebloom leaf and Nicked dagger.
nodes.description: Search Foret de Hennetiel for harvesting points and harvest Hennebloom leaf and Nicked dagger. Click [1] for a map with harvesting points. Harvesting for key items is easier with a full inventory, as the Harvesting Point will not move if you don't harvest physical items.

nodes.title: Return to Fritha for another cutscene.
nodes.description: Return to Fritha for another cutscene.

nodes.title: Examine Door: Svenja's Manor (I-8) in Western Adoulin for a scene with Svenja, Othellius, and Ari-Ba
nodes.description: Examine Door: Svenja's Manor (I-8) in Western Adoulin for a scene with Svenja, Othellius, and Ari-Barali that grants your reward.

nodes.title: Talk to Orsa-Porsa at the Morimar Basalt Fields Frontier Station at (K-10).
nodes.description: Talk to Orsa-Porsa at the Morimar Basalt Fields Frontier Station at (K-10).

nodes.title: Trade him an Apkallu Egg, a Felicifruit, and a jar of Uleguerand Milk to obtain a Hot springs care p
nodes.description: Trade him an Apkallu Egg, a Felicifruit, and a jar of Uleguerand Milk to obtain a Hot springs care package.

nodes.title: Head to the Hot Springs at (H-7).
nodes.description: Head to the Hot Springs at (H-7).

nodes.title: Remove all equipment and check the Hot Springs for cutscene.
nodes.description: Remove all equipment and check the Hot Springs for cutscene. Leaving your earrings, rings, and/or back piece equipped will also initiate the cutscene.

nodes.title: Return to Orsa-Porsa to receive 500 bayld and the Calor resilience survival skill.
nodes.description: Return to Orsa-Porsa to receive 500 bayld and the Calor resilience survival skill.

nodes.title: Note: You must wait until the next game day after completing "For Whom the Bell Tolls" to begin this
nodes.description: Note: You must wait until the next game day after completing "For Whom the Bell Tolls" to begin this quest!

nodes.title: Speak to Sylvie in Western Adoulin as a level 90+ Geomancer for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Speak to Sylvie in Western Adoulin as a level 90+ Geomancer for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Obtain 3 Acuex Ores and trade them to Sylvie.
nodes.description: Obtain 3 Acuex Ores and trade them to Sylvie. Acuex Ores can be purchased from the auction house or farmed from Flatus Acuexes and Putrid Acuexes in Cirdas Caverns. (F-8) is an ideal camp for farming Flatus Acuexes. The acuex family resists nearly all forms of damage except Fire.

nodes.title: Next, head to M-8/9 in Cirdas Caverns and examine the Overgrown Grave for another cutscene.
nodes.description: Next, head to M-8/9 in Cirdas Caverns and examine the Overgrown Grave for another cutscene. A Colonization Reive at M-8 may need to be cleared to reach the grave. The grave is next to an Ergon Locus. You may wish to complete Clear: Cirdas Caverns and Survey: Cirdas Caverns at the same time.

nodes.title: Return to Eastern Adoulin and speak to Nhili Uvolep at I-7 for a cutscene with Lhaiso Neftereh, Sylv
nodes.description: Return to Eastern Adoulin and speak to Nhili Uvolep at I-7 for a cutscene with Lhaiso Neftereh, Sylvie, Hemborok, Gregoirellaud, Lionardois, and Obelailai, and your reward. You must wait one game day to begin the next quest.

nodes.title: Speak to Sylvie in Western Adoulin as a level 99 Geomancer for a cutscene with Sylvie.
nodes.description: Speak to Sylvie in Western Adoulin as a level 99 Geomancer for a cutscene with Sylvie. You must wait one game day after completing the previous quest to begin this quest.

nodes.title: Speak to Nhili Uvolep in Eastern Adoulin for another cutscene and Lhaiso Neftereh's bell.
nodes.description: Speak to Nhili Uvolep in Eastern Adoulin for another cutscene and Lhaiso Neftereh's bell. You can change jobs after receiving the key item. WARNING - If using Windower, you may get locked in the cutscene with a black screen. Simply log on normally through the official launcher to complete the cutscene. It is possible unloading the add-on Enternity causes this problem. Please, consider unloading it (lua unload enternity) during this cutscene. Those assisting the Geomancer(s) will not be in possession of the Lhaiso Neftereh's bell. As a one time reward for their services, they will receive up to 10,000 baylds. The actual number depends upon either the number of players assisting in the defeat of the Ancestral Rage or the number of players assisting in the defeat who have never received this bayld reward.

nodes.title: Travel to M-8/9 in Cirdas Caverns and examine the Overgrown Grave for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Travel to M-8/9 in Cirdas Caverns and examine the Overgrown Grave for a cutscene. As before, a Colonization Reive may need to be cleared to reach the grave.

nodes.title: Examine the Overgrown Grave again to spawn an Ancestral Rage NM.
nodes.description: Examine the Overgrown Grave again to spawn an Ancestral Rage NM. This NM is a byrgen elemental (earth and darkness) with very high physical damage reduction. Casts high level Earth and Darkness magic including Sleepga II, AOE Drain, and AOE Aspir. Can use Entomb (AoE Earth damage, Slow, Petrify, and Hate Reset) and Tenebral Crush (AoE Darkness damage, Defense Down). Wind and Light damage is very effective and speeds up the fight considerably.

nodes.title: After defeating the Ancestral Rage, examine the Overgrown Grave again for a cutscene.
nodes.description: After defeating the Ancestral Rage, examine the Overgrown Grave again for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Return to Sylvie for a last cutscene, your reward, and title.
nodes.description: Return to Sylvie for a last cutscene, your reward, and title.

nodes.title: Talk to Estelle (F-9) in Eastern Adoulin.
nodes.description: Talk to Estelle (F-9) in Eastern Adoulin. You will receive Margret's writ of summons.

nodes.title: Check the crate at the base of the ramp at (I-9) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Check the crate at the base of the ramp at (I-9) for a cutscene. You will receive Portrait of Melvien The quest will appear in your quest log at this point.

nodes.title: Talk to Chumli-Mojumli (K-10) and ask for Estienneux to receive a cutscene and Melvien's Turn.
nodes.description: Talk to Chumli-Mojumli (K-10) and ask for Estienneux to receive a cutscene and Melvien's Turn.

nodes.title: Talk to Mastan (G-6) in Western Adoulin.
nodes.description: Talk to Mastan (G-6) in Western Adoulin. You will receive Melvien's Death?

nodes.title: Return to the crate at Eastern Adoulin (I-9) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Return to the crate at Eastern Adoulin (I-9) for a cutscene. You will receive Margret's memo.

nodes.title: Go to Rala Waterways (H-6) and check the Storage Container for a cutscene with Margret, Reginald, an
nodes.description: Go to Rala Waterways (H-6) and check the Storage Container for a cutscene with Margret, Reginald, and Mufeh Hajrrha. The nearest entrance is at Western Adoulin (Big Bridge).

nodes.title: Return to the crate at Eastern Adoulin (I-9) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Return to the crate at Eastern Adoulin (I-9) for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Talk to Estelle (F-9) for your reward.
nodes.description: Talk to Estelle (F-9) for your reward.

nodes.title: Optional: Go to Foret de Hennetiel (F-7) and examine the ??? at the river's edge.
nodes.description: Optional: Go to Foret de Hennetiel (F-7) and examine the ??? at the river's edge. There are two ways to get there. From bivouac #4 go north and travel upstream. From bivouac #1 go west crossing over the reive and then heading south to (F-7) and the ???. Your Margret's writ of summons will become Margret's imposter's cipher, and your Margret's memo will become Margret's imposter's cipher redux. Go to Selbina and board (for 100 gil) the ferry bound for Mhaura. Once on board, proceed to examine the map hanging in front of the helmsman / pilot. You will lose both key items and in exchange you'll receive five (5) High-purity Baylds.

missions.title: The Good, the Bad, the Clement

nodes.title: Talk to Zaffeld at Eastern Adoulin (J-8) for a cutscene in which Nashu asks you to go with him to Yo
nodes.description: Talk to Zaffeld at Eastern Adoulin (J-8) for a cutscene in which Nashu asks you to go with him to Yorcia Weald.

nodes.title: Travel to Yorcia Weald (J-6) (west side about 1/3 of the way up from the south border of the grid sq
nodes.description: Travel to Yorcia Weald (J-6) (west side about 1/3 of the way up from the south border of the grid square) and examine the Occultist Footprints for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Travel to Marjami Ravine (G-10) (northwest corner) and examine the Hostage Tent for a cutscene, Ente
nodes.description: Travel to Marjami Ravine (G-10) (northwest corner) and examine the Hostage Tent for a cutscene, Enter the cave at (J-10). then climb at (I-10,11) and then enter the cave at (H-9) to get to the Hostage Tent.

nodes.title: Examine the Hostage Tent once more to spawn a Velkk Sentinel.
nodes.description: Examine the Hostage Tent once more to spawn a Velkk Sentinel.

nodes.title: Defeat the Velkk Sentinel.
nodes.description: Defeat the Velkk Sentinel. Velkk Sentinel has around 10,000 HP with no notable attacks. Alter Egos can be used for the fight.

nodes.title: After defeating the Velkk Sentinel, click on tent for a cutscene then travel to (I-10) and examine S
nodes.description: After defeating the Velkk Sentinel, click on tent for a cutscene then travel to (I-10) and examine Seat of Gramk-Droog for a final cutscene with Mligni-Vorgut and the Blackthorn Coven and your reward.

nodes.title: Talk to Vastran (directly west of Peacekeepers' Coalition Waypoint ) to receive a Eastern Adoulin pa
nodes.description: Talk to Vastran (directly west of Peacekeepers' Coalition Waypoint ) to receive a Eastern Adoulin patrol route.

nodes.title: Follow the route as shown in the key item and speak with a specific NPC in this order: Peacekeepers'
nodes.description: Follow the route as shown in the key item and speak with a specific NPC in this order: Peacekeepers' Coalition (Fostaig G-7) Wharf (Lamaron at G-5) Statue of the Goddess (Irate Destrier at G-8/G-9) Sverhried Hillock (Nhili Uvolep) at I-7) Adoulin Castle (Ploh Trishbahk at K-9) Residential Area (Cunegonde at G-11) Scouts' Coalition (Ndah Tolohjin at G-9)

nodes.title: Return to Vastran for your reward.
nodes.description: Return to Vastran for your reward.

missions.title: The Old Man and the Harpoon

nodes.title: Talk to Jorin to start the quest and receive a Broken harpoon.
nodes.description: Talk to Jorin to start the quest and receive a Broken harpoon.

nodes.title: Head to the Inventors' Coalition and speak with Shipilolo to receive an Extravagant harpoon.
nodes.description: Head to the Inventors' Coalition and speak with Shipilolo to receive an Extravagant harpoon.

nodes.title: Give the Extravagant harpoon to Jorin at (J-4) to complete the quest.
nodes.description: Give the Extravagant harpoon to Jorin at (J-4) to complete the quest.

nodes.title: Talk to Behsa Alehgo at (J-8) in Eastern Adoulin for a cutscene with Rigobertine and Erfimia.
nodes.description: Talk to Behsa Alehgo at (J-8) in Eastern Adoulin for a cutscene with Rigobertine and Erfimia.

nodes.title: Travel to (F-9) Eastern Adoulin and speak to Wegellion inside the Scouts' Coalition for a cutscene w
nodes.description: Travel to (F-9) Eastern Adoulin and speak to Wegellion inside the Scouts' Coalition for a cutscene with Reepi-Molpi.

nodes.title: Travel to the (J-8) Yorcia Weald frontier station and speak to Emjook-Renook for a cutscene with Ree
nodes.description: Travel to the (J-8) Yorcia Weald frontier station and speak to Emjook-Renook for a cutscene with Reepi-Molpi.

nodes.title: After the cutscene, you must now find an Unblemished pioneer's badge.
nodes.description: After the cutscene, you must now find an Unblemished pioneer's badge. The badge can only be found at one of three "Suspicious Places." (J-8) -- SW corner, near the bottom of a tree. Behind the 00-06 bush. (I-8) -- Past the 21-03 bush, in a swarm of Numbing Blossoms. (H-9) -- North of Lost Article.

nodes.title: Return to the frontier station and speak to Emjook-Renook for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Return to the frontier station and speak to Emjook-Renook for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Return to Behsa Alehgo for the final cutscene and your reward.
nodes.description: Return to Behsa Alehgo for the final cutscene and your reward.

nodes.title: Wait 1 game day after doing Hunger Strikes before starting.
nodes.description: Wait 1 game day after doing Hunger Strikes before starting.

nodes.title: Talk to Westerly Breeze, who complains of thirst now.
nodes.description: Talk to Westerly Breeze, who complains of thirst now.

nodes.title: Synthesize or purchase a Goblin Drink from the Auction House.
nodes.description: Synthesize or purchase a Goblin Drink from the Auction House.

nodes.title: Return to Westerly Breeze and trade him the Goblin Drink for your reward.
nodes.description: Return to Westerly Breeze and trade him the Goblin Drink for your reward.

nodes.title: Travel to Sih Gates (K-7) and examine Ergon Locus to scoop up some water.
nodes.description: Travel to Sih Gates (K-7) and examine Ergon Locus to scoop up some water. Closest waypoint is Foret de Hennetiel Frontier station, then north into Sih Gates

nodes.title: Travel to Moh Gates (K-7) and examine Ergon Locus to scoop up some water.
nodes.description: Travel to Moh Gates (K-7) and examine Ergon Locus to scoop up some water. Closest waypoint is Morimar Basalt Fields Frontier station, then southeast into Moh Gates

nodes.title: Travel to Dho Gates (F-12) and examine Ergon Locus to scoop up some water.
nodes.description: Travel to Dho Gates (F-12) and examine Ergon Locus to scoop up some water. Closest waypoint is Foret de Hennetiel Bivouac #4, then southwest in Dho Gates.

nodes.title: Zone into Cirdas Caverns for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Zone into Cirdas Caverns for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Travel to the south-east corner of Cirdas Caverns (K-7) and examine the Hiding Place for a cutscene
nodes.description: Travel to the south-east corner of Cirdas Caverns (K-7) and examine the Hiding Place for a cutscene and reward.

nodes.title: Speak with Zaffeld (J-8) in Eastern Adoulin, who will tell you about the strike on the Velkk.
nodes.description: Speak with Zaffeld (J-8) in Eastern Adoulin, who will tell you about the strike on the Velkk.

nodes.title: Zone into Marjami Ravine from Dho Gates for a cutscene with Nashu, Araustoix, Cilmad, and Vortimere
nodes.description: Zone into Marjami Ravine from Dho Gates for a cutscene with Nashu, Araustoix, Cilmad, and Vortimere that flags the quest.

nodes.title: From Bivouac #2, head southeast to the tunnel at (J-10), then continue on to (I-10).
nodes.description: From Bivouac #2, head southeast to the tunnel at (J-10), then continue on to (I-10).

nodes.title: Check the Seat of Gramk-Droog at (I-10) for a cutscene with Nashu, Araustoix, Cilmad, Vortimere, the
nodes.description: Check the Seat of Gramk-Droog at (I-10) for a cutscene with Nashu, Araustoix, Cilmad, Vortimere, the Blackthorn Coven, Mligni-Vorgut, Gramk-Droog, and Brezit-Kyorgul.

nodes.title: Check it again to fight Mligni-Vorgut, a high-level black mage.
nodes.description: Check it again to fight Mligni-Vorgut, a high-level black mage.

nodes.title: After the battle, check the Seat again for a cutscene.
nodes.description: After the battle, check the Seat again for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Travel to Western Adoulin and check the Hospital (I-9) for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Travel to Western Adoulin and check the Hospital (I-9) for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Return to Zaffeld (J-8) in Eastern Adoulin for the final cutscene and reward.
nodes.description: Return to Zaffeld (J-8) in Eastern Adoulin for the final cutscene and reward.

nodes.title: Talk to Rumin-Flumin at Bivouac # 3 to accept the quest.
nodes.description: Talk to Rumin-Flumin at Bivouac # 3 to accept the quest.

nodes.title: After accepting the quest walk southwest to G-10 and click on the Pollinating Swarm to set the Land
nodes.description: After accepting the quest walk southwest to G-10 and click on the Pollinating Swarm to set the Land of Milk and Honey hive on the ground. Rest until you get a message saying you have caught 10 bees (should only take a few seconds).

nodes.title: Click on the Pollinating Swarm again to pick up the Full Land of Milk and Honey hive.
nodes.description: Click on the Pollinating Swarm again to pick up the Full Land of Milk and Honey hive.

nodes.title: Talk to Ndah Tolohjin outside of the Scouts' Coalition in Eastern Adoulin (outside the north-east co
nodes.description: Talk to Ndah Tolohjin outside of the Scouts' Coalition in Eastern Adoulin (outside the north-east corner of the building) for your reward.

nodes.title: Talk to Zaffeld at K-8 in Eastern Adoulin for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Talk to Zaffeld at K-8 in Eastern Adoulin for a cutscene. He talks about the Blackthorn Coven setting traps in the wilderness. Nashu, an exorcist, approaches and asks you to go to J-6 in Yorcia Weald.

nodes.title: Examine the Occultist footprints (J-6 at the center of the I-6/J-6 border) in Yorcia Weald for anoth
nodes.description: Examine the Occultist footprints (J-6 at the center of the I-6/J-6 border) in Yorcia Weald for another cutscene with Soraa Ishakal, Melisandra, and Zunmimi.

nodes.title: Trade one Snapweed Secretion and two Snapweed Tendrils to the Occultist footprints for your reward.
nodes.description: Trade one Snapweed Secretion and two Snapweed Tendrils to the Occultist footprints for your reward.

nodes.title: Talk to Lucretia at Bivouac #1 in Ceizak Battlegrounds to begin the quest.
nodes.description: Talk to Lucretia at Bivouac #1 in Ceizak Battlegrounds to begin the quest.

nodes.title: Defeat Fernfelling Chapuli (south of Lucretia, at H-9) until you obtain Mantid bait.
nodes.description: Defeat Fernfelling Chapuli (south of Lucretia, at H-9) until you obtain Mantid bait.

nodes.title: Use the bait to spawn Truculent Mantis by clicking on the Claw Marks at H-8.
nodes.description: Use the bait to spawn Truculent Mantis by clicking on the Claw Marks at H-8.

nodes.title: Defeat Truculent Mantis to obtain a Flayed mantid corpse.
nodes.description: Defeat Truculent Mantis to obtain a Flayed mantid corpse. All party members participating in the quest receive the Flayed mantid corpse upon kill.

nodes.title: Return to Lucretia for your reward.
nodes.description: Return to Lucretia for your reward. Any unused Mantid bait is taken away by Lucretia at this point.

nodes.title: Travel to (G-10) Western Adoulin and speak with Peladi Shalmohr to activate the quest.
nodes.description: Travel to (G-10) Western Adoulin and speak with Peladi Shalmohr to activate the quest. Must wait for next game day after previous quest.

nodes.title: Travel to (J-11) Western Adoulin and check the Mischief Marker for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Travel to (J-11) Western Adoulin and check the Mischief Marker for a cutscene.

nodes.title: Tuffle-Buffle requests your input to help Musto-Rusto win over his love, Minnifi.
nodes.description: Tuffle-Buffle requests your input to help Musto-Rusto win over his love, Minnifi. (Bold entries seem to work 100% of the time.) What hat should he wear?Snowman CapShneddick ChapeauQiqirn Hood What opening line should he use?Hey, pretty. Wanna see my Mog Garden?I heard you're an excellent cook.I wanna see you in a subligar! nodes.title: There are three easily obtainable food items.

nodes.title: Touch again to battle the Bomb NM Incensed Pineapple.
nodes.description: Touch again to battle the Bomb NM Incensed Pineapple. Alter Egos may be called before touching. The party will be placed under Level Restriction status. All party members must be on or have beaten this fight to help. You have 15 minutes to complete this battle.

nodes.title: Strategy If the bomb uses Self-Destruct, you fail the battle.
nodes.description: Strategy If the bomb uses Self-Destruct, you fail the battle. At 1 HP, the bomb will attempt to use Self-Destruct, but will then fall to the ground without using it. It will stay at 1 HP until doing this, so there's no need to stun it. The bomb must be kept dispelled, otherwise it will self-destruct. It will use blaze spikes and berserk; if these are left on for more than a few seconds, it will use self-destruct! Self-Destruct is triggered as a counter-measure if Incensed Pineapple HP drops too fast, preventing massive zergs or conduit strats. In fact, a SMN conduiting the NM right from the start will eventually trigger Self-Destruction pretty early in the burn, while a controlled low-medium DPS will have little to no problem in this fight. While Self-Destruct is more related to how fast the NM dies, keeping it dispelled is essential because it has very high magic attack, dropping almost 90% of Amchuchu's HP in a single Fire V, what would be expected in high Lv NM in game, and not a quest NM. That's a hint that you need to keep it dispelled so the NM will constantly recast Blaze-Spike and Berserk, making it pretty much harmless in terms of danger. Trust: Koru-Moru, Trust: Arciela II, Trust: Ajido-Marujido, and Trust: Ovjang all have Dispel.
